summary: An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of North 85th St. between Aurora Ave. North and Corliss Ave. North, and of Meridian Ave. North between North 85th St. as established herein and North 86th St.; establishing an access roadway within the S 1/2 of North 85th St. between Corliss Ave. North and a point approximately 100 feet west thereof; providing for the acquisition by condemnation of property and property rights necessary in each instance therefor, including the right to construct slopes for cuts and fills on certain abutting property; providing for the establishing of the necessary grades; and providing for payment therefor.
